metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Learn how to create a chat message with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to create a chat message with CSS.

content.text: Hey! I'm fine. Thanks for asking!
Sweet! So, what do you wanna do today?
content.html: Sweet! So, what do you wanna do today?

content.text: Nah, I dunno. Play soccer.. or learn more coding perhaps?
content.html: Nah, I dunno. Play soccer.. or learn more coding perhaps?

content.code:
Hello. How are you today?

  11:00
   

Hey! I'm fine. Thanks for asking!

  11:01
   

Sweet! So, what do you wanna do today?

  11:02
   

Nah, I dunno. Play soccer.. or learn more coding perhaps?

  11:05
content.code_html:
<div class="container">
  <img src="/w3images/bandmember.jpg" alt="Avatar">
  <p>Hello. How are you today?</p>
  <span class="time-right">11:00</span>
</div>

<div class="container darker">
  <img src="/w3images/avatar_g2.jpg" alt="Avatar" class="right">
  <p>Hey! I'm fine. Thanks for asking!</p>
  <span class="time-left">11:01</span>
</div>

<div class="container">
  <img src="/w3images/bandmember.jpg" alt="Avatar">
  <p>Sweet! So, what do you wanna do today?</p>
  <span class="time-right">11:02</span>
</div>

<div class="container darker">
  <img src="/w3images/avatar_g2.jpg" alt="Avatar" class="right">
  <p>Nah, I dunno. Play soccer.. or learn more coding perhaps?</p>
  <span class="time-left">11:05</span>
</div>

syntaxHighlighting.text: float: left;  max-width: 60px;  width: 100%;  margin-right: 20px;  border-radius: 50%;

syntax_highlighting.text: float: left;  max-width: 60px;  width: 100%;  margin-right: 20px;  border-radius: 50%;

content.code_html:
/* Chat containers */
.container {
  border: 2px solid #dedede;
  background-color: #f1f1f1;
  border-radius: 5px;
  padding: 10px;
  margin: 10px 0;
}

/* Darker chat container */
.darker {
  border-color: #ccc;
  background-color: #ddd;
}

/* Clear floats */
.container::after {
  content: "";
  clear: both;
  display: table;
}

/* Style images */
.container img {
  float: left;
  max-width: 60px;
  width: 100%;
  margin-right: 20px;
  border-radius: 50%;
}

/* Style the right image */
.container img.right {
  float: right;
  margin-left: 20px;
  margin-right:0;
}

/* Style time text */
.time-right {
  float: right;
  color: #aaa;
}

/* Style time text */
.time-left {
  float: left;
  color: #999;
}
